title: How to Connect the Bose Soundlink Mini to Your Smartphone or Tablet

steps.title: Put the Soundlink Mini on charge.
steps.content: Put the Soundlink Mini on charge. Then go to your Bluetooth device.

steps.title: Go to the Bluetooth app.
steps.content: Go to the Bluetooth app. Turn on the Bose Soundlink Mini.

steps.title: Press the Bluetooth button on the speaker.
steps.content: Press the Bluetooth button on the speaker. This makes it discoverable.

steps.title: Watch the lights on the Soundlink Mini.
steps.content: Watch the lights on the Soundlink Mini. The Bluetooth light will flash blue. When this happens, turn on the Bluetooth on your device and wait until it discovers the speaker. It will come out as 'Bose mini sou'.

steps.title: Press the 'Bose mini sou' button.
steps.content: Press the 'Bose mini sou' button. The speaker will let out a sort of high piano group of notes. This means that it is connected.

steps.title: Listen to your music.
steps.content: Listen to your music. You can enjoy wireless freedom for up to 7 hours of music playback!
